channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon hit with fresh class action-style suit in UK — $3.4BN in competition damages sought for 200,000+ sellers

item.title: ‘SimCity’ Isn’t a Model of Reality. It’s a Libertarian Toy Land
item.description: Beneath its playful exterior, the beloved game that inspired a generation of real-world urban designers betrays a partisan view of social planning.
